name: Ext_R3_MessageDefinition_fo_profile
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MessageDefinition.focus.profile for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MessageDefinition.focus.profile from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Profile that must be adhered to by focus
element.definition: A profile that reflects constraints for the focal resource (and potentially for related resources).
element.comment: `MessageDefinition.focus.profile` maps to R4 `MessageDefinition.focus.profile`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
